summary:
The City Mod, is a resource pack for modders which includes a 26 new city buildings and a demo
city outside white run approximately the same size as White run.
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to THE CITY MOD NEW VERSION INCLUDES LODS FOR ALL NEW BUILDINGS

This mod is a resource pack of city buildings for modders to use to create their own large cities.
It includes a 27 new city buildings, LOD\'s for the buildings and a demo area outside white run.
The demo area is about the same size as white run but is not nearly as detailed as its only purpose
is to showcase the buildings. 

Most of the new buildings are based off pre existing buildings that had incomplete portions.
eg: they had no back as they were intended to be used in conjunction with other objects and only viewed from the front. What I\'ve done is modelled up the missing facades, redone the collision meshes, and added a few entire new buildings, So you can now place city buildings anywhere, without requiring other objects to hide incomplete portions.

NOTE MODDERS: IF YOU USE THIS RESOURCE PACK PLEASE CREDIT THIS MOD IN YOUR READ ME AND DESCRIPTION.

To install, extract meshes folder, and gkbbigcity.esp into the skyrim data folder 
(default location C:\\\\Program Files (x86)\\\\Steam\\\\SteamApps\\\\common\\\\Skyrim\\\\Data)

This resource pack includes the following -

13 City buildings

sanhousegkb.nif
sevette san housegkb.nif
sstyrrshousegkb.nif
sthe winking skeevergkb.nif
sbuildinggkb.nif
svittoriavicihousegkb.nif
sbryling housegkb.nif
sthalmorhousegkb.nif
shouseforsalegkb.nif
sblacksmith2gkb.nif
shmd_apothecarygkb.nif
sblacksmith1gkb.nif
sthalmorbarracksgkb.nif

14 houses

sfarmhouse04gkb.nif
sfarmhouse05gkb.nif
sfarmhouse06gkb.nif
sfarmhouse07gkb.nif
sfarmhouse08gkb.nif
sfarmhouse08gkbterrace.nif
sfarmhouse09gkb.nif
sfarmhouse09gkbterrace.nif
sfarmhouse10gkb.nif
sfarmhouse10gkbterrace.nif
sfarmhouse11gkb.nif
sfarmhouse12gkb.nif
sfarmhouse13gkb.nif
soverhanggkb.nif

ALSO INCLUDES LODS FOR ALL BUILDINGS

For other GKB mods, look for GKB Green Trees (resource pack with hundreds of new tree models) 
and Caribou Gone (an environment mod adding hundreds of tree types across the skyrim landscape)

PS. I named this the BIG CITY Mod before realising there is a Morrowind Mod of the same name, So I\'m just calling it \"The City Mod\" because then at least it can be confused with hundreds of mods instead of one. :)
author: Ga-Knomboe Boy
